name: "balance" Tee
description:
We are all people. Judgement should not be placed on us based on the clothes we wear, the colour of our skin, or hair, the way we show our creativity. Equality is very important to us, and we hope it is to you as well. This shirt is for everyone and anyone who agrees that everyone should be treated equally.

This shirt shows our logo on the front in red and on the back it says:

"LOVE EVERYBODY" in big black text.

This shirt is a comfortable, good quality shirt. It is a Hanes Tagless shirt, meaning no annoying tags scratching at your neck!Right now we only have the white with red logo available, but more varieties will come as we find more popularity with these shirts! Contact us with any questions you have!
